item.description: 3G Introduction of the internet (email, web browsing, etc.) required Basic Requirements Bit rates up to 2 Mbps Quality of Service delay sensitive to flexible best efforts For video - can tolerate 10% bit error rate Heterogeneous error rate requirements Email - delay insensitive but error sensitive Classes Conversational class Streaming class Interactive class Background class 1 References TELE4652-lecture-00 ↩︎

item.title: 2.75G
item.description: 2.75G Based on General Packet Radio Services Enhanced data rates for GSM evolution. Adaptive modulation (rate control) Maintains signal to noise ratio at the desired level 1 References  ↩︎
5G Vision Massive Internet of Things Millions nodes per km^2 Mission-critical control Low latency is key for autonomous vehicles.
